messages.body: Dopamine overdose on my morning trading (blog journal just posted). Big fast moves in my trading account and even moreso in my swing account (not blogged). Beautiful gains today. I got MY piece, even if I left a few lucrative targets on the table. $BLDP $CIIC $PLTR $QS $TSLA

messages.body:
$BLDP 

Posted this yesterday. Who loaded up? I did! Breaking out beautifully.
$FCEL $BLDP $PLUG $BLNK my favorites!

$WKHS is still lagging my hydrogens $PLUG $FCEL and $BLDP but the WKHS breakout is not far away. 

This is not the WKHS breakout rally but it’s coming soon.
$BLDP I'm in. I like this chart

$FCEL  $BLDP $PLUG Just sitting here in disbelief. I knew it was coming but seeing is believing..I have things to do today so as usual the run really takes off when I don't watch the real fun begins..CYAaaahhh at close!!!!
$BLDP ‘Tis the H2 season
$BLDP oooopps. sold.   That was too fast for me to change my sell.  Ok buy back on a pullback hopefully
$PLUG +8.5%,$BLDP +6.5%, $FCEL +10%, $BE +6%... the whole hydrogen sector is going crazy. So do we. ✌️
$BLDP   breaking out
$BLDP perfect short squeeze if it can go to 23. The short better be ready
$BLDP Thank god! Finally you are climbing too!
